org.apache.batik.ext.awt.MultipleGradientPaint.CycleMethodEnum

Packages that use MultipleGradientPaint.CycleMethodEnum
org.apache.batik.ext.awt This package contains a few classes from the Apache Batik project. 
 

Uses of MultipleGradientPaint.CycleMethodEnum in org.apache.batik.ext.awt
 

Fields in org.apache.batik.ext.awt declared as MultipleGradientPaint.CycleMethodEnum
protected  MultipleGradientPaint.CycleMethodEnum MultipleGradientPaint.cycleMethod
          The method to use when painting out of the gradient bounds.
static MultipleGradientPaint.CycleMethodEnum MultipleGradientPaint.NO_CYCLE
          Indicates (if the gradient starts or ends inside the target region) to use the terminal colors to fill the remaining area.
static MultipleGradientPaint.CycleMethodEnum MultipleGradientPaint.REFLECT
          Indicates (if the gradient starts or ends inside the target region), to cycle the gradient colors start-to-end, end-to-start to fill the remaining area.
static MultipleGradientPaint.CycleMethodEnum MultipleGradientPaint.REPEAT
          Indicates (if the gradient starts or ends inside the target region), to cycle the gradient colors start-to-end, start-to-end to fill the remaining area.
 

Methods in org.apache.batik.ext.awt that return MultipleGradientPaint.CycleMethodEnum
 MultipleGradientPaint.CycleMethodEnum MultipleGradientPaint.getCycleMethod()
          Returns the enumerated type which specifies cycling behavior.
